Methods in control with parameters of type Coord
 void Responder.createBlock(int id, Coord c)
          creates a block that blocks the path of every route on its way, code removed, uncomment and fix errors

          creates a delay at a point that affects all trips passing thorough that coordinate

          Finds a particular route by starting and ending Coordinates

 void Simulator.reroute(Truck truck, Coord blockage)

Methods in model.cargo with parameters of type Coord
 void Trip.addPoint(Coord p)
          adds a point to the trace of the trip, this method should be called whenever the truck moves, and will be the same as a the planned route unless an event creates a reroute on the trip and the truck has to take an alternate route
